repos.name: frep
repos.description: A find and replace utility. Modify strings by passing an array of RegExp or string replacement patterns

repos.name: fs-utils
repos.description: File utils from Grunt.js. This is temporary, we'll switch to grunt-file when it's published.

repos.name: glob-utils
repos.description: Globbing utilities for Grunt.js and node.js projects.

repos.name: grunt-init-helper-mod
repos.description: Grunt init template for creating a new helper module.

repos.name: handlebars-helper-aggregate
repos.description: {{aggregate}} handlebars helper. inlines content from multiple files optionally using wildcard (globbing/minimatch) patterns. uses YAML front matter as context for each file. optionally pass in a sorting function.

repos.name: handlebars-helper-compose
repos.description: {{compose}} handlebars helper. Similar to {{aggregate}}, but this is a block expression helper that inlines content from multiple files differently, extracting YAML front matter to pass to context for each file. Optionally use wildcard (globbing/minimatch) patterns. Accepts compare function as 3rd parameter for sorting inlined files.

repos.name: handlebars-helper-condense
repos.description: Remove extra newlines from HTML content.

repos.name: handlebars-helper-jade
repos.description: {{jade}} handlebars helper, for converting basic Jade templates to HTML.

repos.name: handlebars-helper-lorem
repos.description: {{lorem}} handlebars helper, for generating lorem lorem placeholder text.

repos.name: handlebars-helper-moment
repos.description: {{moment}} handlebars helper. Combines the powers of Assemble, Handlebars.js and Moment.js into a great helper to master time.

repos.name: handlebars-helper-partials
repos.description: Handlebars helper for including partials, with improvements over native partial handling, such as file globbing and the ability to override context.

repos.name: handlebars-helper-post
repos.description: {{post}} handlebars helper, for including a post, or a list of posts.

repos.name: handlebars-helper-prettify
repos.description: {{prettify}} handlebars helper, for formatting ("beautifying") HTML, CSS and JavaScript.

repos.name: handlebars-helper-repeat
repos.description: {{repeat}} handlebars helper, for duplicating a block of content n times.

repos.name: handlebars-helper-slugify
repos.description: Convert strings into URL slugs.

repos.name: logger
repos.description: Logging utilities for Node.js projects.

repos.name: matchkeys
repos.description: Return an array of resolved filepaths for specified npm module dependencies. Minimatch patterns can be used.

repos.name: meta
repos.description: General planning around helpers. Also the place to make requests and suggestions.

repos.name: node-name
repos.description: Basic utility methods for transforming and handling file paths.

repos.name: sort-object
repos.description: Sort the keys in an object.

repos.name: strip-yfm
repos.description: Strip YAML front matter from files.

repos.name: utils
repos.description: Library of javascript utils

repos.name: utils-compare
repos.description: Utility compare function, accepts two objects (a,b) and returns 1 if a >= b otherwise -1.

repos.name: utils-concat-array
repos.description: Takes a string and an array of strings and concatenates the first string to each string in the array.

repos.name: utils-update
repos.description: Update the properties on an object with the properties from another object.

repos.name: yfm
repos.description: Helpers and examples for extracting, parsing, and passing context from YAML front matter into your templates. Useful if you need custom programming beyond what Assemble offers by default.
